name: FusionHome
description: FusionHome is a smartphone application software , which can communicate with the inverter locally through the WiFi. It can realize one-click deployment, parameter configuration, and device maintenance, alarm query, query of equipment status, power generation and power data and check the/var/log management, and communication configuration functions and is a convenient local maintenance platform of the inverter. Supports IOS8.0 and later (Android 4.4 or a later version). One-click deployment: guide the user quickly Implement inverter basic configuration, including the connection routing setting, parameter configuration, grid-tied inverters self-checks, or management system configuration. Interconnection parameter settings: Set the national power grid standard code and an expert mode settings, including parameters of power line network, protection parameters, and feature parameter, a power adjustment and time settings. Equipment maintenance: device upgrade , add and delete devices, and inverter power-on and power-off and restore to its factory settings. Device information: electric energy yield and power data check, and alarm query and view the device status. Log management: download, delete, and export APP and inverter log Communication configuration: mainly on the inverter self WiFi password management, route configuration, and connection management system setting
